metadata.title: CVE-2017-0639 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in Bluetooth component could enablea local malicious application to access data outside of its permissionlevels. This issue is rated as High because it is a general bypass foroperating system protections that isolate application data from otherapplications. Product: Android. Versions: 4.4.4, 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1,7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-35310991.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
